CSC 472 Class

 This course introduces the core issues associated with application development for mobile devices using the Android platform. 

 Professor: Jia, Xiaoping

 Xiaoping Jia is the Director of Institute for Software Engineering. 
 Xiaoping Jia received his undergraduate degree and Master's degree in Computer Science from Fudan University, Shanghai, China. He received his Ph.D. in Computer Science from Northwestern University.
